apple.title: Apple Sign-In
apple.clientIdDescription: Apple Service ID, available from Apple Developer Portal
apple.clientSecretDescription: Private key content (.p8 file) for authenticating with Apple
apple.enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in with their Apple ID
apple.keyIdDescription: Your private key ID from Apple Developer Portal
apple.redirectUriDescription: API address for redirect URL after successful Apple authentication. Do not end with /

device.title: Device Authentication
device.blockVirtualMachineDescription: When enabled, prevents devices from running on virtual machines or emulators
device.communicationKeyDescription: Secure communication key between devices and servers
device.enableDescription: When enabled, supports login and registration using multiple device identifiers like IMEI/IDFA/IDFV/AndroidID/MAC address
device.enableSecurityDescription: When enabled, communication between devices and servers will be encrypted
device.showAdsDescription: When enabled, advertisements will be displayed on devices

email.title: Email Authentication
email.emailVerificationDescription: When enabled, users need to verify their email addresses
email.emailSuffixWhitelistDescription: When enabled, only emails with suffixes in the list can register
email.whitelistSuffixesPlaceholder: Enter email suffixes, one per line (e.g., example.com)
email.whitelistSuffixesDescription: Enter email suffixes, one per line (e.g., example.com)
email.enableDescription: When enabled, enables email registration, login, binding, and unbinding functions
email.sendFailure: Test email send failed, please check configuration.
email.sendTestEmailDescription: Send a test email to verify configuration.
email.senderAddressDescription: Default email address used for sending emails.
email.smtpEncryptionMethodDescription: Choose whether to enable SSL/TLS encryption.
email.smtpServerAddressDescription: Specify the server address used for sending emails.
email.smtpServerPortDescription: Specify the port used to connect to the SMTP server.

type.title: Email Type
type.description: Email type identifier, 1 for registration verification code, others for password reset verification code
type.conditionalSyntax: Supports conditional syntax for switching content based on type

expireDate.title: Expiration Date
expireDate.description: Service expiration date, reminds users when service expires

maintenanceDate.title: Maintenance Date
maintenanceDate.description: System maintenance date, displays maintenance start date

maintenanceTime.title: Maintenance Duration
maintenanceTime.description: Estimated maintenance time, displays maintenance time period or duration

facebook.title: Facebook Sign-In
facebook.clientIdDescription: Facebook App ID from Facebook Developer Console
facebook.clientSecretDescription: Facebook App Secret from Facebook Developer Console
facebook.enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in with their Facebook account

github.title: GitHub Sign-In
github.clientIdDescription: Client ID from your GitHub OAuth application settings
github.clientSecretDescription: Client secret from your GitHub OAuth application settings
github.enableDescription: Allow users to sign in with their GitHub accounts

google.title: Google Sign-In
google.clientIdDescription: Google OAuth 2.0 Client ID from Google Cloud Console
google.clientSecretDescription: Google OAuth 2.0 Client Secret from Google Cloud Console
google.enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in with their Google account

phone.title: Phone Authentication
phone.enableTip: When enabled, enables phone registration, login, binding, and unbinding functions
phone.whitelistValidationTip: When enabled, only area codes in the whitelist can send SMS
phone.platformConfigTip: Please fill in the provided {key} configuration
phone.templateTip: Please fill in the SMS template, keep {code} in the middle, otherwise SMS function will not work properly

placeholders.template: Your verification code is {code}, valid for 5 minutes

phone.testSmsTip: Send a test SMS to verify your configuration

telegram.title: Telegram Sign-In
telegram.enableDescription: When enabled, users can sign in with their Telegram account
